stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Adding Random Information to check if the code works !

stix:Course_Of_Action.coa:Title: Block traffic to PIVY C2 Server (10.10.10.10)

coa:Objective.coa:Description: Block communication between the PIVY agents and the C2 Server

coa:Impact.stixCommon:Description: This IP address is not used for legitimate hosting so there should be no operational impact.

stixCommon:TTP.ttp:Title: Victim Targeting: Customer PII and Financial Data
Victim Targeting: Customer PII and Financial Data

incident:Property_Affected.incident:Description_Of_Effect: Data was exfiltrated, has not been determined which data or how.

stix:Incident.incident:Title: Detected Poison Ivy beaconing through perimeter firewalls

stix:Indicator.indicator:Title: Zeus
stix:Indicator.indicator:Description: Finds Zeus variants, twexts, sdra64, ntos

stix-openioc:ioc.description: Finds Zeus variants, twexts, sdra64, ntos

indicator:Test_Mechanism.snortTM:Rule: alert tcp any any -> any any (msg:"FOX-SRT - Flowbit - TLS-SSL Client Hello"; flow:established; dsize:< 500; content:"|16 03|"; depth:2; byte_test:1, <=, 2, 3; byte_test:1, !=, 2, 1; content:"|01|"; offset:5; depth:1; content:"|03|"; offset:9; byte_test:1, <=, 3, 10; byte_test:1, !=, 2, 9; content:"|00 0f 00|"; flowbits:set,foxsslsession; flowbits:noalert; threshold:type limit, track by_src, count 1, seconds 60; reference:cve,2014-0160; classtype:bad-unknown; sid: 21001130; rev:9;)

alert tcp any any -> any any (msg:"FOX-SRT - Suspicious - TLS-SSL Large Heartbeat Response"; flow:established; flowbits:isset,foxsslsession; content:"|18 03|"; depth: 2; byte_test:1, <=, 3, 2; byte_test:1, !=, 2, 1; byte_test:2, >, 200, 3; threshold:type limit, track by_src, count 1, seconds 600; reference:cve,2014-0160; classtype:bad-unknown; sid: 21001131; rev:5;)

stix:Indicator.indicator:Title: IP Address for known C2 channel
File hash for Poison Ivy variant
Malicious executable
stix:Indicator.indicator:Description: Resident binary which implements infostealing and credit card grabber

stix:Indicator.indicator:Title: Malware control server
stix:Indicator.indicator:Description: Malicious domains ond IP wned by actors

stix:TTP.ttp:Title: Victim Targeting: Customer PII and Financial Data
